title: Daggers
content: glowing light in a radius of 6m. Gleamdancer: When this dagger is wielded in the off-hand, the wielder gains a +1 bonus to Armour Class. Piercing Strike Sussur Dagger 1d4 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Silences targets on hit. Piercing Strike Arcane Absorption Dagger 1d4 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Properties of Arcane Absorption: When you kill an enemy with a melee attack, regain one of your spent 1st Level spell Slots.
